SELECT A.YEAR, A.INSERT_USER_ID, C.USER_NM, C.EMAIL, A.METRIC_GRP_ID, B.METRIC_GRP_NM, A.METRIC_ID AS ITEM_ID, D.SC_DEPT_NM AS ITEM_NM, E.ACTUAL_BASE, F.ATTACH_FILE_NM , F.ATTACH_FILE_FNM , F.ATTACH_FILE_SUFFIX, CASE WHEN F.ATTACH_FILE_PATH IS NULL THEN F.ATTACH_FILE_PATH ELSE F_ENCRYPT(F.ATTACH_FILE_PATH,#encryptionCode#) END ATTACH_FILE_PATH FROM BSC_METRIC A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_METRIC_GRP B ON A.YEAR=B.YEAR AND A.METRIC_GRP_ID=B.METRIC_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER C ON A.INSERT_USER_ID=C.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT D ON A.YEAR=D.YEAR AND A.SC_DEPT_ID=D.SC_DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_IPE_ACT_RPT E ON A.YEAR=E.YEAR AND A.METRIC_GRP_ID=E.METRIC_GRP_ID AND A.METRIC_ID=E.ITEM_ID AND E.EVAL_DEGREE_ID=#findEvalDegreeId# LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_IPE_ACT_RPT_ATTACH F ON A.YEAR=F.YEAR AND A.METRIC_GRP_ID=F.METRIC_GRP_ID AND A.METRIC_ID=F.ITEM_ID AND F.EVAL_DEGREE_ID=#findEvalDegreeId# AND F.SEQ=1 WHERE A.YEAR=#findYear# AND A.TYPE_ID='02' AND A.DELETE_DT IS NULL AND D.DELETE_DT IS NULL
A.INSERT_USER_ID = #findInsertUserId#
AND A.METRIC_GRP_ID NOT IN( SELECT DISTINCT METRIC_GRP_ID FROM BSC_IPE_ITEM WHERE YEAR=#findYear# AND EVAL_DEGREE_ID=#findEvalDegreeId#) UNION ALL SELECT A.YEAR, A.ACT_RPT_INSERT_USER_ID, C.USER_NM, C.EMAIL, A.METRIC_GRP_ID, B.METRIC_GRP_NM, A.ITEM_ID, A.ITEM_NM, D.ACTUAL_BASE, E.ATTACH_FILE_NM , E.ATTACH_FILE_FNM , E.ATTACH_FILE_SUFFIX, CASE WHEN E.ATTACH_FILE_PATH IS NULL THEN E.ATTACH_FILE_PATH ELSE F_ENCRYPT(E.ATTACH_FILE_PATH,#encryptionCode#) END ATTACH_FILE_PATH FROM BSC_IPE_ITEM A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_METRIC_GRP B ON A.YEAR=B.YEAR AND A.METRIC_GRP_ID=B.METRIC_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER C ON A.ACT_RPT_INSERT_USER_ID=C.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_IPE_ACT_RPT D ON A.YEAR=D.YEAR AND A.METRIC_GRP_ID=D.METRIC_GRP_ID AND A.ITEM_ID=D.ITEM_ID AND A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID=D.EVAL_DEGREE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_IPE_ACT_RPT_ATTACH E ON A.YEAR=E.YEAR AND A.METRIC_GRP_ID=E.METRIC_GRP_ID AND A.ITEM_ID=E.ITEM_ID AND A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID=E.EVAL_DEGREE_ID AND E.SEQ=1 WHERE A.YEAR=#findYear# AND A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID=#findEvalDegreeId#
A.ACT_RPT_INSERT_USER_ID = #findInsertUserId#
ORDER BY INSERT_USER_ID, METRIC_GRP_ID, ITEM_ID

SELECT YEAR , EVAL_DEGREE_ID , METRIC_GRP_ID , ITEM_ID , ITEM_GBN , ACTUAL_BASE , INSERT_USER_ID FROM BSC_IPE_ACT_RPT WHERE YEAR = #year# AND EVAL_DEGREE_ID = #evalDegreeId# AND METRIC_GRP_ID = #metricGrpId# AND ITEM_ID = #itemId#
SELECT YEAR , EVAL_DEGREE_ID , EVAL_DEGREE_NM FROM BSC_ECM_EVAL_DEGREE WHERE YEAR = #year# AND EVAL_DEGREE_ID = #evalDegreeId#
SELECT USER_NM FROM V_ROLE_USER WHERE USER_ID=#insertUserId#
SELECT METRIC_GRP_NM FROM BSC_METRIC_GRP WHERE YEAR = #year# AND METRIC_GRP_ID = #metricGrpId#

SELECT B.SC_DEPT_NM AS ITEM_NM FROM BSC_METRIC A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT B ON A.YEAR=B.YEAR AND A.SC_DEPT_ID=B.SC_DEPT_ID WHERE A.YEAR=#year# AND A.METRIC_GRP_ID=#metricGrpId# AND A.METRIC_ID=#itemId# UNION SELECT ITEM_NM FROM BSC_IPE_ITEM WHERE YEAR=#year# AND METRIC_GRP_ID=#metricGrpId# AND ITEM_ID=#itemId#

SELECT DISTINCT A.INSERT_USER_ID, B.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM FROM BSC_METRIC A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER B ON A.INSERT_USER_ID=B.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR=#findYear# AND A.TYPE_ID='02' AND A.DELETE_DT IS NULL AND A.INSERT_USER_ID IS NOT NULL AND A.METRIC_GRP_ID NOT IN( SELECT DISTINCT METRIC_GRP_ID FROM BSC_IPE_ITEM WHERE YEAR=#findYear# AND EVAL_DEGREE_ID=#findEvalDegreeId#) UNION SELECT DISTINCT A.ACT_RPT_INSERT_USER_ID AS INSERT_USER_ID, B.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM FROM BSC_IPE_ITEM A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER B ON A.ACT_RPT_INSERT_USER_ID=B.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR=#findYear# AND A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID=#findEvalDegreeId#
